name: Regress
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor:
"Once cast, a spell can be undone. But once revealed, a secret can never again be kept."
—Pontifex, elder researcher

"Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

name: Regrowth
text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: While the root remains, the tree yet lives.

name: Reign of Chaos
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Plains and target white creature.
• Destroy target Island and target blue creature.

editions.flavor:
"The Burning Isles are the home to a dozen lords who claim dominion. Jamuraa will look to only one leader: me."
—Kaervek

name: Reign of Terror
text: Destroy all green creatures or all white creatures. They can't be regenerated. You lose 2 life for each creature that died this way.

editions.flavor:
"I don't know what takes them; they die around me without time to scream."
—Scout Ekemet, final journal

name: Reign of the Pit
text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.

name: Reincarnation
text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return a creature card from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under the control of that creature's owner.

editions.flavor:
"You cannot imagine what eyes you may look through tomorrow."
—Aerona, elder druid

name: Reinforced Bulwark
text:
Defender
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

editions.flavor: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.

name: Reinforcements
text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

editions.flavor:
"Let them send their legions! I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."
—General Varchild

—King Darien of Kjeldor

"Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."
—General Varchild

name: Reins of Power
text: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

name: Reins of the Vinesteed
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, you may return Reins of the Vinesteed from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to a creature that shares a creature type with that creature.

name: Reiterate
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

editions.flavor:
"Echoes of the Mirari's power yet linger."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

name: Reito Lantern
text: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

editions.flavor: Lanterns carved from the mystic stones of the Reito Mines were said to light the way of lost souls.
Lanterns carved from the mystic stones of the Reito Mines were said to light the way of lost souls.

text:
Flying

text:
Rekindled Flame deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

name: Reki, the History of Kamigawa
text: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card.

editions.flavor:
"After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Reknit
text: Regenerate target permanent.

editions.flavor:
"An axe may break upon a ribbon if the ribbon's will is the stronger."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

text: Destroy X target artifacts. Create X 2/2 red Gremlin creature tokens.

editions.flavor:
"Being an inventor means knowing how to use the tools at hand to make something great—or to bring it down."
—Pia Nalaar

editions.flavor: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life."

editions.flavor: A sword that has seen cowardice in battle exacts the price of honor from its wielder.

name: Relic Barrier
text: {T}: Tap target artifact.

editions.flavor: Its transmissions are the word of Memnarch. It speaks, and metal bows.

editions.flavor: Sometimes gestures of support are small. Sometimes not.

name: Reliquary Monk
text: When Reliquary Monk dies, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

editions.flavor: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.

name: Reliquary Tower
text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: When the aven scouts located the tower in Esper, the Knights of the Reliquary set off on a righteous crusade to recover their lost treasures.

editions.flavor: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

"We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

name: Rend Flesh
text: Destroy target non-Spirit creature.

"The Reito Massacre was a testament to the kami's unstoppable power. The human defenders might as well have been moths battling a forest fire."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand.

name: Rending Volley
text:
Rending Volley can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.

editions.flavor: The sky offers few hiding places.

name: Rend Spirit
text: Destroy target Spirit.

editions.flavor:
"The battle at Ganzan Pass was a testament to human endurance. The untrained and frightened group escaped three legions of kami, leaving more than their share of slain foes in their wake."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

—Tristen, Cathar Marshal

editions.set: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis
editions.flavor: Confront it at your own peril, for it will confront you for its own amusement.

name: Renegade Doppelganger
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)

editions.flavor: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.

name: Renegade Firebrand
text: As long as you control a Chandra planeswalker, Renegade Firebrand gets +1/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

editions.flavor: "For freedom! For fame! For fire!"

text:
Whenever Renegade Freighter attacks, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

Renegade Map enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Renegade Map: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: "We have safe houses in every zone, but you'll never find one without this."

editions.flavor: "This fight belongs to us all."

name: Renegade's Getaway
